      • extractCoursesFromTables

        private int extractCoursesFromTables(java.lang.String url)
                              throws GraphBuilderException
        This method will try to extract courses information from the web page assuming that the courses will be stored in a table format. Firstly, the course number will be identified in every row of the table using regular expressions. If considerable number of rows have course number, then the column index of the table corresponding to each course related information will be retrieved and finally the course details will be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        url - Webpage URL
        Returns:
        Number of courses retrieved
        Throws:
        GraphBuilderException - Thrown when any issue during scraping

      • extractCourseLinksFromWebpage

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractCourseLinksFromWebpage(java.lang.String url)
                                                                throws GraphBuilderException
        Throws:
        GraphBuilderException

      • doesRowHaveCourseNumber

        private boolean doesRowHaveCourseNumber(org.jsoup.nodes.Element row)
        Uses regex to find whether a table row contains a course number
        Parameters:
        row - Table row element
        Returns:
        true If any column in the row contains course number, false otherwise
